content: purl to last st pfb - 61sts row 18 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 63sts row 13 decrease cast off 6 sts purl-wise for right paw pm for right row 19 increase pfb purl to last st pfb - 65sts knee bend marker on last cast-off stitch purl to end of row - 57sts pm at each end of last purl row for left and right foreleg seam markers new born puppy pattern page 15 new born puppy pattern page 16 inside left foreleg foreleg seams row 20 increase kfb knit 11 turn flip work over so purl side faces row 23 increase cast on 8 sts for left foreleg seam knit to end next short row p13 note these are not wrap and turn row row 24 increase cast on 8 sts for right foreleg seam purl to end - 43sts next short row k13 turn row 25-26 work 2 row stocking stitch next short row p13 row 27 decrease k8 skpo k23 k2tog k8 to end of row - 41sts next short row k13 row 28 decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog - 39sts next short row p13 work short row to shape back as follows cast off all 13 left inside foreleg sts short row 1 k38 w+tk pm on last cast-off stitch for left inner foreleg marker short row 2 p37 w+tp back to whole row short row 3 k36 w+tk row 21 decrease rejoin yarn cd cast off 7 sts for left foreleg seam short row 4 p35 w+tp knit across all remaining sts - 46sts short row 5 k34 w+tk inside right foreleg short row 6 p33 w+tp row 22 increase pfb purl 11 turn flip work over so knit side faces short row 7 k32 w+tk next short row k13 short row 8 p31 w+tp next short row p13 turn short row 9 k30 w+tk next short row k13 short row 10 p29 w+tp next short row p13 short row 11 k28 w+tk next short row k13 short row 12 p27 w+tp cast off all 13 right inside foreleg sts purl-wise short row 13 k26 w+tk pm on last cast-off stitch for right inner foreleg marker short row 14 p25 w+tp back to whole row short row 15 k32 across to the end of row row 22 decrease rejoin yarn cd cast off 7 sts purl-wise for right row 29 purl all 39 sts foreleg seam purl across all remaining sts - 27sts new born puppy pattern page 17 new born puppy pattern page 18 left hind leg short row 7 p6 w+tp row 30 increase cast on 5 sts pm for left hind leg k13 skpo k19 k2tog k8 short row 8 k7 w+tk to end - 42sts short row 9 p8 w+tp right hind leg short row 10 k9 w+tk row 31 increase cast on 5 sts pm for right hind leg purl to end - 47sts short row 11 purl to end work short row
